byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Emma G. Fitzsimmons, Joseph Goldstein, Benjamin Mueller and Nate Schweber.

abstract: At least 12 men and women have been attacked by men wielding knives or razors in New York City subways in several months, which has set many in city on edge, particularly as there seems to be no motive for crimes.
lead_paragraph: At least 12 victims have been attacked by men wielding knives or razors in separate and seemingly random assaults in recent months.

headline.main: Spate of Slashings, Brazen and Random, Puts New Yorkers on Edge
headline.print_headline: A Series of Slashings, Brazen and Random, Puts New Yorkers on Edge

snippet: At least 12 victims have been attacked by men wielding knives or razors in separate and seemingly random assaults in recent months.
